sn35.15:1.1: “Mendicants, I went in search of the eye’s gratification,
sn35.15:1.3: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the eye’s gratification.
sn35.15:1.4: I went in search of the eye’s drawback,
sn35.15:1.6: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the eye’s drawback.
sn35.15:1.7: I went in search of escape from the eye,
sn35.15:1.9: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the eye.
sn35.15:1.10: I went in search of the ear’s …
sn35.15:1.23: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the mind’s gratification.
sn35.15:1.24: I went in search of the mind’s drawback,
sn35.15:1.26: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the mind’s drawback.
sn35.15:1.27: I went in search of escape from the mind,
sn35.15:1.29: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the mind.
sn35.15:2.1: As long as I didn’t truly understand these six interior sense fields’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening …
sn35.15:2.2: But when I did truly understand …
sn35.15:2.3: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn35.15:2.4: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there’ll be no more future lives.’”
